title: Should Veteran QBs Mentor Rookies & Game Of Thrones Recap with Lindsay Rhodes
itunes:title: Should Veteran QBs Mentor Rookies & Game Of Thrones Recap with Lindsay Rhodes
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by Lindsay Rhodes to tackle the game of football and the game of life. First up, they get into Joe Flacco saying his job isn't to mentor rookie Drew Lock (4:15). Next, the duo debates which team they want to see on HBO's Hard Knocks since the final four candidates have been released (19:45) and in honor of the NBA Draft Lottery what's their favorite sporting event where no sports are played (27:13)? Lastly, Shek, Lindsay & Eddie Spaghetti recap the penultimate episode of Game Of Thrones (36:10).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
